mean_cn: v.（因不愿意做或习惯性地）耽搁，拖延
mean_en: to be slow or late about doing something that should be done; to delay doing something until a later time because you do not want to do it, because you are lazy, etc.
sentence: He always procrastinates studying, he's too easily distracted!
sentence_trans: 他总是拖延着不去学习，太容易分心了！
word_etyma: pro很多…+crastin明天+ate动词后缀→有许多明天明日复明日→procrastinate拖延
